Package Controllers

Class CineplexManager

java.lang.Object
Controllers.CineplexManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class CineplexManager extends Object implements Manager
This class handles the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) methods for Cineplexes. Only Admins have access to the methods within this Class. This class implements the read and write methods in the Manager interface.

    • findCineplex

      public static Cineplex findCineplex(String cineplexCode)
      Read Method, find a single Cineplex by Cineplex code
      Parameters:
      cineplexCode - Unique 3-Character Code of the Cineplex
      Returns:
      an object of type Cineplex IOException: CHECKED --> Thrown when assessing data in the specified file fails ItemNotFoundException: UNCHECKED --> Thrown during runtime when users enter a cineplexCode that does not exist in the database
